snippet: Morphy Auctions is offering the collection of George Moyer, who has long dominated the niche market of vintage firecracker packages.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column notes that Morphy Auctions in Denver, Pa, is offering 3,000 vintage firecracker packages from the collection of George Moyer and Antique Helper auction house in Indianapolis is offering ancient North American birdstones from the collection of Earl C Townsend Jr.
lead_paragraph: Morphy Auctions is offering the collection of George Moyer, who has long dominated the niche market of vintage firecracker packages.
